recommendations.message: Improve color contrast ratios to meet WCAG AA standards
recommendations.action: Review and update color palette in design tokens

recommendations.message: Improve ARIA implementation for better screen reader support
recommendations.action: Add missing ARIA labels, roles, and states to components

recommendations.message: Add support for reduced motion preferences

wcagGuidelines.name: Non-text Content
wcagGuidelines.description: All non-text content has text alternatives

wcagGuidelines.name: Info and Relationships
wcagGuidelines.description: Information and relationships are programmatically determinable

wcagGuidelines.name: Keyboard
wcagGuidelines.description: All functionality is available via keyboard

wcagGuidelines.name: Focus Order
wcagGuidelines.description: Focus order is logical and intuitive

wcagGuidelines.name: On Focus
wcagGuidelines.description: Focus does not trigger unexpected context changes

wcagGuidelines.name: Parsing
wcagGuidelines.description: Markup is valid and properly structured

wcagGuidelines.name: Name, Role, Value
wcagGuidelines.description: UI components have accessible names and roles
